articles.title: Bride rages wedding dress looks 'nothing like order' before realising mortifying mistake - Mirror Online
articles.description: A bride's Facebook post has gone viral after she lashed out at a wedding shop for the dress they had sent her for the big day - only for staff to hilariously point out her error
articles.content:
A soon-to-be bride was left mortified after a wedding shop quickly put her in her place when she complained the dress that arrived looked "nothing like" the one she had ordered.
